sections.heading: Sections, how construed.It is declared that sections 81-501
sections.text: 01 to 81-531 and 81-5,151 to 81-5,157 are in nature necessary for the public safety, health, peace, and welfare and shall be liberally construed.SourceLaws 1925, c. 183, ยง 28, p. 490;C.S.1929, ยง 81-5528;R.S.1943, ยง 81-529;Laws 1993, LB 348,
